name: magical primer
desc: An introduction to magical theory.

name: workbook
desc: A book on the practical applications of magic.

name: bookworm
desc: A studious annelid to choose a home within a tome's pages.

name: mystic waters
desc: Water suffused with enchantments.

name: mana tree
desc: A tree by a magic spring exhibits surprising qualities.

name: heathered copse
desc: You rest in the shade amid flowers of heather.

name: occult tapestry
desc: A tapestry with strange, hidden meanings.

name: foggy dale
desc: The fog here is so thick, you can't see your own hands.

name: dusty chest
desc: A battered, wooden chest.

name: iron chest
desc: A solid iron chest.

name: dusty chest
desc: A small but solid chest.

name: oak chest
desc: A sturdy, oaken chest.

name: advanced primer
desc: More advanced magical theory.

name: talking to thyffr
desc: Within a ramble of mundane details, thyffr often discloses some genuine history.

name: babbling delki
desc: The Delki of the woods know many things, but are seldom coherent.

name: affable gnome
desc: A gnome is always more than willing to talk over a pint or a pipe.

name: gibbering
desc: They hide in small cracks and in return for a wicked deed, will reveal one secret.
flavor: Legend tells of a massive gibbering, who will answer any question in return for a murder.

name: mummified remains
desc: A corpse preserved by the stale air.

name: eerie moans
desc: You hear a faint moaning, but are unable to determine its source.

name: strange bones
desc: You've never seen such bones before.

name: embalming apparatus
desc: Fluids and recepticles for the preservation of corpses.
Ancient coffin marked by faded runes.

name: plague rats
desc: The scurrying vermin are covered in welts.

name: haunted glade
desc: Trees here have an eerie aspect.

name: hidden cache
desc: You sense something buried nearby.

name: murky waters
desc: Ominous shapes drift and flow beneath the murky waters.

name: hettie
desc: An ancient gryffon lives atop the Rithel's solitary turret, and Hettie spends her days grooming and feeding the beast.

name: Talk To Pidwig
desc: Pidwig is sparse with words, but has seen many mysteries in his travels.

name: pidwig's hoard
desc: Over the years Pidwig has amassed a sizeable collection of gems and artifacts.
flavor: Perhaps he could be induced to part with some...

name: starry night
desc: A clear sky affords an endless view of the firmament.

name: pidwig's starcharts
desc: An old hand at astronomical calculations, Pidwig shares his extensive observations.

name: somber sunset
desc: Lapping waves in the dying sun hint at secrets beyond your reach.

name: bright vista
desc: A small knoll reveals lands far into the distance.

name: runic tome
desc: Even deciphering the runes is a tedious chore.

name: dhrunic manuscript
desc: Much that was is lost.
flavor: For none now live, who remember it.

name: master's workbook
desc: A book on the practical applications of magic.

name: fazbit's furnace
desc: Its embers still glow after centuries.

name: alchemical equipment
desc: The uses of these instruments are beyond you.

name: crumbled statue
desc: The old stonemasons often chiselled spells into their works.

name: eldar statue
desc: Its weathered face has gazed upon the world since the Wind Age.

name: ancient battlefield
desc: Blasted hills and scraps of armor still mark an ancient site of battle.

name: thandhrun pass
desc: Higher even than Gorborung, the passes of Thandhrun incessantly thunder.

name: the old stone
desc: The massive head of stone and moss is said to be as old as the world itself.
flavor: A voice seems to grumble from the ground.

name: star shrine
desc: A glowing star cinder embedded in a shrine.
flavor: You can't seem to pry it loose.

name: tenwick
desc: Tenwick is often on the trail, but always glad to stop and trade tales.

name: wyrd sister
desc: The Wyrd sister Hecubah waits by the roadside.
flavor: Blank verse is hard to interpret.

name: markhul's gap
desc: Gazing over the dizzy edge, you see no sign of a bottom.

name: mirror of introspection
desc: It's just you.

name: mirror of false reflection
desc: Something is wrong with the glass.

name: mirror of foretelling
desc: Visions of the future play in your reflection.

name: seething mirror
desc: The glass fixes your gaze and stokes your wrath.

name: reflecting hallways
desc: You soon become lost in the false cooridors.

name: void mirror
desc: You see all shapes clearly reflected; but completely black.
flavor: For now you see in a mirror, darkly.

name: water mirror
desc: Through the mirror you appear to be drowning.

name: mirror of history
desc: The mirror shows scenes from long ago.

name: a distant mirror
desc: The mirror shows scenes from far away.

name: sandstorm
desc: The blistering sands peel away your skin.

name: oasis
desc: A cooling spring and frond trees relieve the monotony of the wastes.

name: mirage
desc: Extended travel beneath the hot sun produces visceral visions in the sand.

name: lost trading post
desc: In the midst of a wide desolation, a tall grey-skinned creature with no eyes offers you its wares.

name: winds of madness
desc: Voices on the wind scream and echo in your mind.

name: orrem rains
desc: Rare but torrential, the Orrem rains are accounted a wonder of the world.

name: hidden cave
desc: The shifting sands reveal a rocky cave. Perhaps some artifacts remain within.

name: caravan
desc: All features of the riders are hidden in robes. They communicate with guttural sounds and gestures.

name: aeon clock
desc: Legend has it that Thurn himself crafted the ten leagues of clockworks in the Orrem Sands. Year by year, it ticks away the endless Aeons.
flavor: Its vast face is nothing to what is reputed to lie buried below.

name: blood grass
desc: Steel-sharp blades of grass bite into your boots.

name: spider swarm
desc: Piled higher than your head, an eclectic mass of skittering spiders bars the path.

name: snake swarm
desc: Writhing in heaps and drooping from branches, a mass of snakes covers the vicinity.

name: agolith
desc: Hidden in a deep pond, it lures its prey with a fruiting branch growing from its head.

name: cockatrice
desc: An unnatural blend of serpent and rooster. As its stare is death, you avert your gaze as you approach.

name: trumple
desc: A stout tree with stumpy legs and a face inlaid within its trunk.
flavor: It can't speak but likes it when you feed it oil.

name: balmuth
desc: A gigantic reptile plows its jaw through the earth to eat.
flavor: It seems to like rocks the best.

name: moss-stone portal
desc: One of a dozen mossy portals at the edges of the menagerie. Their use is unknown.

name: scale of ouroboros
desc: At the center of the menagerie a single massive scale merges with the tree.

name: gryffon
desc: Generally peaceful creatures, a gryffon is nevertheless deadly when enraged.

name: wyvern
desc: Believed to be a distant cousin of dragons, some are even venomous.

name: hydra
desc: A multi-headed beast rears its heads from the water.

name: barghest
desc: The great dog-like beast is a portent of death.

name: phoenix
desc: One of the rarest of birds, they are not uncommon in this place.

name: pod of poglers
desc: The placid poglers angle their backs of bushy leaves to the sun.

name: flithy
desc: You meet a creeping creature with twenty furry legs and nothing else.

name: menagerie hanging
desc: A pristine tapestry nearby displays a partial index of the menagerie.

name: bestiary
desc: A manual of beastly lore rests atop an ancient pedestal.

name: pile of scrolls
desc: Someone left a number of scrolls haphazardly strewn about.

name: burbling stream
desc: A lovely stream burbles along here. Magical energy flows along its route.

name: secret cache
desc: You sense something buried nearby.

name: forgotten chest
desc: A dusty but solid chest. No one seems to have touched it in a long time.

name: mossy logs
desc: Fallen logs covered in moss block the path.

name: mud patch
desc: A muddy stretch of the path has to be traversed carefully, or you'll slip.

name: woodland critters
desc: Birds flit to and fro and small woodland animals scurry about in all directions, paying you no heed.

name: small cave
desc: There's a small cave just off the path ahead. Might be worth investigating, as long as you're not claustrophobic.

name: flower meadow
desc: A sunny clearing is full of wildflowers.

name: gnarled old tree
desc: An ancient, gnarled old tree stands here. You almost feel like it's watching you.

name: dusty chest
desc: A small locked chest sits here gathering dust. No one seems to have opened it in a long time.

name: rithel fortifications
desc: You spend some time repairing and reinforcing Rithel's ancient fortifications.

name: grizzled veteran
desc: A battle-scarred old ranger tells you tales of his past adventures.

name: watching the woods
desc: You spend some time monitoring the nearby forest from atop Rithel's walls. Everything seems quiet.

name: tower view
desc: From the top of Rithel's tower, you have a spectacular view of the surrounding area.

name: ranger patrol
desc: A stern-looking group of rangers passes by. You're not sure if they're coming or going, but they aren't interested in chatting with you.

name: alchemical transmutation
desc: This alchemical apparatus seems to have been intended to transmute lead into gold.

name: blazing heat
desc: The relentless heat of the sun beats down on you.

name: pulsating crystal
desc: An odd crystal pulses rhythmically in the darkness. .... . .-.. .-.. ---

name: crashing waves
desc: Enormous waves crash against the rocky shore.
